price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ̀mí ara yín dọwọ́ yín. Ẹni tí ó ti ṣìnà kò lè kó ìnira ba yín nígbà tí ẹ bá ti mọ̀nà. Ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu ni ibùpadàsí gbogbo yín pátápátá. Nígbà náà, Ó máa fún yín ní ìró ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡۖ لَا يَضُرُّكُم مَّن ضَلَّ إِذَا ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُمۡۚ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِيعٗا فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ʿalaykum anfusakum lā yaḍurrukum man ḍalla idhā ih'tadaytum ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum jamīʿan fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
